sections.title: Function keys
sections.content:
Table content:
Key | Visible?1 | Marked?2 | Effect
Fn+Esc | No | Yes | Enables Fn lock
Fn+F1 | ? | Yes | XF86AudioMute
Fn+F2 | ? | Yes | XF86AudioLowerVolume
Fn+F3 | ? | Yes | XF86AudioRaiseVolume
Fn+F4 | ? | Yes | Mute microphone
Fn+F5 | ? | Yes | Screen brightness lower
Fn+F6 | ? | Yes | Screen brightness raise
Fn+F7 | ? | Yes | ? unknown function
Fn+F8 | ? | Yes | Airplane mode
Fn+F9 | ? | Yes | ? unknown function
Fn+F10 | ? | Yes | Pick up call
Fn+F11 | ? | Yes | Hang up call
Fn+F12 | ? | Yes | Favorites (probably Windows specific)
Fn+Space | ? | Yes | Keyboard backlight brightness

1. The key is visible to xev and similar tools
1. The physical key has a symbol on it, which describes its function
